#Setup directory paths
SET(ROOT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
SET(HEADERS ${ROOT}/headers)
SET(SOURCES ${ROOT}/sources)

#Initiate source files
FILE(GLOB MYARMA_HEADERS ${HEADERS}/*.h)
FILE(GLOB MYARMA_SOURCES ${SOURCES}/*.cpp)

#Create library
ADD_LIBRARY(myarma SHARED ${MYARMA_HEADERS} ${MYARMA_SOURCES})
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(myarma PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE C)

#Install file
INSTALL(TARGETS myarma DESTINATION external/myarma)
